title: TYPOPHILE LOGO
content:
HI Folks,

Hope I am in the right forum, how do I submit a design for the Typophile logo at the top of the page?

Thanks in advance!

Cheer
author: mcdseven

comments.content:
The logos were submitted as part of a [Type Battle](http://web.archive.org/web/20090517053049/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%252BBattle) that was held last year. Therefore,we are no longer accepting submissions, unfortunately. Thanks for your interest!

[http://typophile.com/typebattles](http://web.archive.org/web/20090517053049/http:/typophile.com/typebattles "http://typophile.com/typebattles")
